channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bin waste spread all over the road, 21st February
item.description:
These bins weren’t put in bins and the foxes have opened them all over the road. This issue keeps persisting in this road.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Church Walk, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress and others flytipped on Willow Walk, 21st February
item.description:
Mattress and other items flytipped on bench in the back of the Pickle Factory on Willow Walk. Second time the same issue is being reported with no action. please clear

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 61, Willow Walk, Old Kent Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 14 empty chicken cartons someone stop this ignorant person, 21st February
item.description:
Ignorant litter mad fox feeder after 4 years of reporting still nothing is done 4 elderly volunteers cleaned all this river bank just a wwwk ago and already 14 chicken raw chicken cartons along river bed and at risk of being dragged into river it’s litter is a mess and it’s utter madness it’s driving us all crazy my drive is cover in fox crap and we are so fed up with her doing this it’s attracting rats and mess

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Finsbury Way, Bexley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti in eirth Subway, 21st February
item.description:
There are to spots of graffiti in the eirth Subway you got the middle of the subway you someone painted three penis on the wall and and end you got a 5th penis what says at the bottom of it I like pussy if you are are unsure walk through the subway and you will find it and it will need to be removed or repainted please thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
